Articles.Content: I want a mod that Tethers kerbals to a command hatch, That lets me push a button and it takes my kerbal to the hatch, I have lost TOO many kerbals doing eva. Thank you for reading, if there is a mod that does this that, please tell me. Thanks!!

You can do this with KAS. Just mount a winch close enough to your hatch that your Kerbal can grab it. I will attach to his back so when you are ready you could switch back to the ship and reel him in.
While it's good role play, how are you losing so many kerbals to EVA?
But the kraken needs his daily snack or he will feed on your relay network.
